shayari: Zindagi mein agar kabhi kisi ko chaha hai, toh usse kabhi chhodna nahi.
Meri jaan, tu meri duniya hai.
Dil se dil milte hain, bas waqt ka intezaar hota hai.
Tere bina jee na paaye, yeh dil mera tujhse hi pyaar kare.
Jab se tumse mili hoon, zindagi mein rang bhar gaye hain.
Tere khayalon mein kho jaana hai, dil ki har ek baat kehna hai.
Meri zindagi ke har pal mein tu ho, meri duniya bas tu hi toh hai.
Teri muskurahat hi meri khushi ka raaz hai.
Meri jaan, tum mere liye sab kuch ho.
Dil ki gehraiyon mein, bas tum hi tum ho.
Pyar ka ek rang hota hai, jo tumhara hi ho sakta hai.
Aankhon mein tum ho, zindagi mein tum ho.
Zindagi ki sabse khoobsurat baat hai, tumhara saath.
Kuch toh hai jo tum se juda hai, ye dil ki baat hai.
Teri yaadon ka silsila, kabhi khatam nahi hota.
Meri zindagi ki subah ho tum, meri raat ho tum.
Meri khushi ka raaz tum ho, tumse pyaar karna hai.
Dil se tumhe chaha hai, tumse juda rehna hai.
Tumhare saath har lamha sukoon hai.
Jab tum paas hote ho, sab kuch adhoora lagta hai.
Meri duaaon mein tumhi ho, meri zindagi ka har khwab tumhi ho.
Agar tum saath ho toh zindagi mein har mushkil asaan lagti hai.
Meri saari khushiyan tum se hi hai.
Tumse juda ho kar, sab kuch bekaar lagta hai.
Zindagi mein tum saath ho, toh har din nayi khushiyan milti hain.
Tere saath har pal khubsoorat lagta hai.
Dil ki baat har baar tumse hi kehna chahta hoon.
Teri aankhon mein woh jaadu hai, jo mere dil ko behalaye rakhta hai.
Tere bina jeena mujhse nahi ho paata.
Meri duniya tu hai, meri khushiyan tu hai.
Pyar ka ehsaas, bas tumse hai.
Meri zindagi mein bas tumhara hi rang chhaya hai.
Dil ki har ek baat, tumse hi kahin hai.
Jab tum mere paas hote ho, toh zindagi mein sab kuch perfect lagta hai.
